workflow.name: Send WooCommerce new category alert via WhatsApp using Rapiwa API
workflow.description:
# Send WooCommerce New Category Alert via WhatsApp Using Rapiwa API

This n8n automation listens for the creation of a new WooCommerce product category, fetches all WooCommerce customers, cleans and formats their phone numbers, verifies them using the Rapiwa WhatsApp validation API, sends a WhatsApp message to verified numbers with the new category info, and logs each interaction into a Google Sheet (separately for verified and unverified customers).

## Who this is for

You have a WooCommerce store and want to:

- Send a promotional message when a new product category is added,  
- Verify customer WhatsApp numbers in bulk,  
- Keep a clear log in Google Sheets of which numbers are verified or not.

## What it does (high level)

1. Webhook is triggered when a new WooCommerce category is created.  
2. Fetches all WooCommerce customers via API.  
3. Limits processing to the first 10 customers (for performance/testing).  
4. Cleans phone numbers (removes `+`, spaces, and non-digits).  
5. Verifies each number via Rapiwa WhatsApp Verify API.  
6. If verified: sends WhatsApp message with new category info, logs as `Verification = verified`, `Status = sent`.  
7. If not verified: logs as `Verification = unverified`, `Status = not sent`.  
8. Processes users in batches with delays to avoid rate limiting.

## How it works (step-by-step)

- **Trigger**: Webhook node is triggered by WooCommerce category creation.  
- **Format Data**: Category details (name, slug, description) are parsed.  
- **Get Customers**: Fetch all WooCommerce customers using the WooCommerce API.  
- **Limit**: Only the first 10 are processed.  
- **Loop & Clean**: Loop over each customer, clean phone numbers and extract info.  
- **Verify Number**: Send HTTP POST to `https://app.rapiwa.com/api/verify-whatsapp`.  
- **Decision Node**: Use `If` node to check if `exists == true`.  
- **Send Message**: If verified, send WhatsApp message with category details.  
- **Append to Sheet**: Log verified and unverified customers separately in Google Sheets.  
- **Wait + Batch Control**: Use `Wait` and `SplitInBatches` nodes to control flow and prevent throttling.

### Example verify body (HTTP Request node):

```json
{
  ""number"": ""{{ $json['WhatsApp No'] }}""
}
```

## Google Sheet Column Reference

| name        | number        | email                        | address                                              | catagoris   | description                                                                                         | status     |
|-------------|---------------|------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------|-------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| Abdul Mannan | 8801322827799 | contact@spagreen.net   |  mirpur dohs  | Electronics | SShop top-braxxxxrable tech. | unverified |
| Abdul Mannan | 8801322827799 | contact@spagreen.net | mirpur dohs   | Electronics | Shop top-braxxxxrable tech. | verified   |
| Abdul Mannan  | 8801322827799 | contact@spagreen.net | mirpur doh  | Electronics | Shop top-braxxxxrable tech. | verified   |


## Customization ideas

- Send images, videos, or template messages if supported by Rapiwa.  
- Personalize messages using name or category data.  
- Increase delay or reduce batch size to minimize risk of rate limits.  
- Add a second sheet to log full API responses for debugging and auditing.

## Best practices

- Test on small batches before scaling.  
- Only send messages to users who opted in.  
- Store API credentials securely using n8n‚Äôs credentials manager.  
- Ensure your Google Sheet column headers match exactly with what's expected.
---

### Key Improvements Made

- Clarified the **trigger source** as a _Webhook from WooCommerce category creation_.  
- Fixed inconsistency in the **""What it does""** section (originally referenced reading from Google Sheets, but your workflow starts from WooCommerce, not Sheets).  
- Standardized terminology to match n8n nodes: Webhook, Loop, HTTP Request, etc.  
- Aligned the flow exactly with your nodes:  
  - Webhook ‚Üí Format ‚Üí Get Customers ‚Üí Limit ‚Üí Loop ‚Üí Clean ‚Üí Verify ‚Üí If ‚Üí Send/Log ‚Üí Wait ‚Üí Repeat

---
 ## Useful Links
- **Dashboard:** [https://app.rapiwa.com](https://app.rapiwa.com/login)
- **Official Website:** [https://rapiwa.com](https://rapiwa.com/)
- **Documentation:** [https://docs.rapiwa.com](https://docs.rapiwa.com/)

## Support

- WhatsApp Support: [Chat Now](https://wa.me/8801322827799)  
- Discord: [Join SpaGreen Community](https://discord.gg/SsCChWEP)  
- Facebook Group: [SpaGreen Support](https://www.facebook.com/groups/spagreenbd)  
- Website: [https://spagreen.net](https://spagreen.net)  
- Developer Portfolio: [Codecanyon SpaGreen](https://codecanyon.net/user/spagreen/portfolio)
"

workflow.name: Send WooCommerce New Category Alert via WhatsApp Using Rapiwa API

parameters.content:
# Send WooCommerce New Category Alert via WhatsApp Using Rapiwa API

# Overview
This n8n workflow sends a WhatsApp message to customers when a new WooCommerce product category is created. It checks customers‚Äô phone numbers with Rapiwa, sends the promotional message only to verified WhatsApp numbers, and logs results in Google Sheets.

---

## Features
- Listens to **WooCommerce category creation** via **Webhook**
- Fetches all **WooCommerce customers**
- **Cleans and formats** phone numbers
- **Validates WhatsApp numbers** using Rapiwa's verification API
- Sends **promotional WhatsApp messages** to valid numbers
- Logs verified and unverified contacts in separate **Google Sheet rows**
- Includes **Wait node** to space out API calls and Google Sheet writes

---

## Requirements
### Tools & Services
- **A Google Sheet** formatted like this ‚û§ [sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1SbBOtdqaA9eUmgv2W4MXU0-TODjHix-IrmQmuapiSJA/edit?usp=sharing)  
- Valid **Google Sheets OAuth2** credentials connected to n8n
- **Rapiwa API account** with:
 - Your WhatsApp number connected and authorized in Rapiwa
- A **WhatsApp Account** (Personal or Business) 
- Active **Rapiwa account** with a valid **Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE**
- Your **WhatsApp number** connected to Rapiwa
  - Access to `verify-whatsapp` and `send-message` endpoints
  - Valid **Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE** (added in `httpBearerAuth` credentials)
- **WooCommerce store** with REST API access
- **Google Sheets** with two appendable sheets:
  - One for `verified` users
  - One for `unverified` users

### n8n Credentials
- **WooCommerce API Credentials**
- **Rapiwa Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE** (connected via HTTP Request nodes)
- **Google Sheets OAuth2** credentials

### Google Sheet Required Columns:
- `name `
- `number`
- `email`
- `address`
- `catagoris`
- `description`
- `status` (either `verified` or `unverified`)

> **Note:** Field `name ` contains a trailing space. Keep it as-is.

---

## Nodes Used in the Workflow
- **Webhook**
- **Code (for category & customer formatting)**
- **WooCommerce: Get Customers**
- **Limit (max 10 customers)**
- **Split In Batches**
- **Code: Cleane Number**
- **HTTP Request: Verify WhatsApp Number (Rapiwa)**
- **If: Number Exists**
- **HTTP Request: Send WhatsApp Message (Rapiwa)**
- **Google Sheets: Append Verified Row**
- **Google Sheets: Append Unverified Row**
- **Wait**

---

## How to Use This Workflow
### 1. Trigger: New Category Created
- **Node**: `Webhook`
- **Method**: `POST`
- **URL**:  
  `https://n8.spagreen.net/webhook-test/1c217a0f-503f-49a4-b0c5-1aa431616177`
- **Function**: WooCommerce sends payload when a new product category is created.

### 2. Extract Category Info
- **Node**: `Code`
- **Function**: Parses category details like:
  - `name`, `slug`, `description`, etc.

### 3. Fetch WooCommerce Customers
- **Node**: `Get many customers`
- Retrieves all customers from your WooCommerce store.

### 4. Limit & Split
- **Node**: `Limit` ‚Üí Limits to 10 customers (for testing or batching)
- **Node**: `Loop Over Items` ‚Üí Processes customers one at a time

### 5. Clean Phone Numbers
- **Node**: `Cleane Number`
- Extracts phone number from customer billing info
- Removes all non-numeric characters
- Formats name and full address
- Extracts email if available

### 6. Verify WhatsApp Number
- **Node**: `check valid whatsapp number`
- Sends number to:  
  `https://app.rapiwa.com/api/verify-whatsapp`
- Checks if the number is active on WhatsApp

### 7. Branch Based on Validity
- **Node**: `If`
- **Condition**: If `data.exists === true`, then verified

### 8. Send WhatsApp Message (if verified)
- **Node**: `Rapiwa Sender`
- Sends a promotional WhatsApp message using:  
  `https://app.rapiwa.com/api/send-message`

#### Message Template:
```
Hey [Name],
We just launched a new category: [Category Name]!
Explore nowüëâ https://rahim.spagreen.info/product-category/[slug]
Don‚Äôt miss it!

Cheers,
Team SpaGreen Creative
```

### Step 9: Log to Google Sheets
- **Node**: `Google Sheets: Append Verified Row` ‚Üí Logs verified users
- **Node**: `Google Sheets: Append Unverified Row` ‚Üí Logs unverified users
- **Node**: `Wait` ‚Üí Adds delay to avoid API or Sheets rate limits

---

## Google Sheet Column Reference

| name        | number        | email                        | address                                              | catagoris   | description                                                                                         | status     |
|-------------|---------------|------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------|-------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| Abdul Mannan | 8801322827799 | contact@spagreen.net              |                                                      | Electronics | Shop top-brand Electronics with warranty and excellent customer support. Discover everything you need from audio devices to wearable tech. | unverified |
| Abdul Mannan | 8801322827799 | contact@spagreen.net |                                                      | Electronics | Shop top-brand Electronics with warranty and excellent customer support. Discover everything you need from audio devices to wearable tech. | verified   |
| Abdul Mannan  | 8801322827799 | contact@spagreen.net | mirpur dohs, h#1168 rd#10 av#10 mirpur dohs dhaka, dhaka, BD-13, BD                            | Electronics | Shop top-brand Electronics with warranty and excellent customer support. Discover everything you need from audio devices to wearable tech. | verified   |


## Nodes Used in the Workflow
- **Webhook**: Receives category creation event
- **Code**: Parses category and customer data
- **WooCommerce: Get many customers**
- **Limit**: Restricts batch size (optional)
- **Split In Batches**: Loops customers one by one
- **Cleane Number**: Formats phone numbers and extracts details
- **HTTP Request: Verify WhatsApp Number (Rapiwa)**
- **If**: Checks if number is valid
- **HTTP Request: Send WhatsApp Message (Rapiwa)**
- **Google Sheets: Append Verified Row**
- **Google Sheets: Append Unverified Row**
- **Wait**: Adds spacing between actions

---

## Customization Ideas
- Use WooCommerce customer metadata for more personalized messages
- Modify the WhatsApp message template for different product categories
- Create separate sheets for different campaigns
- Extend logic to notify store admin on failed messages

---

## Notes & Warnings
- Ensure your Rapiwa account has a valid, connected WhatsApp number
- Google Sheets credentials must allow write access
- Rate-limiting can cause errors‚Äîadjust the wait time accordingly
- Avoid spamming customers by using opt-in lists only
- Rapiwa is unofficial and may not guarantee 100% delivery rates

## Useful Links
- **Dashboard:** [https://app.rapiwa.com](https://app.rapiwa.com/login)
- **Official Website:** [https://rapiwa.com](https://rapiwa.com/)
- **Documentation:** [https://docs.rapiwa.com](https://docs.rapiwa.com/)

## Support & Help
- **WhatsApp**: [Chat on WhatsApp](https://wa.me/8801322827799)
- **Discord**: [SpaGreen Community](https://discord.gg/SsCChWEP)
- **Facebook Group**: [SpaGreen Support](https://www.facebook.com/groups/spagreenbd)
- **Website**: [https://spagreen.net](https://spagreen.net)
- **Developer Portfolio**: [Codecanyon SpaGreen](https://codecanyon.net/user/spagreen/portfolio)

nodes.name: Check valid whatsapp number Using Rapiwa

parameters.name: message
parameters.value:
=Hey {{ $('Clean Number').item.json.name }},

We just launched a new category: *{{ $('Format Webhook Response Data').item.json.name }}*!  
Explore nowüëâ https://rahim.spagreen.info/product-category/{{ $('Format Webhook Response Data').item.json.slug }}
Don‚Äôt miss it!

Cheers,  
Team SpaGreen Creative

parameters.content:
## Webhook
**Node Name:** Webhook  
**Function:** Listens for incoming HTTP POST requests ‚Äî specifically, product category creation data from WooCommerce. Triggers the workflow.

## & Format Webhook Response Data
**Node Name:** Format Webhook Response Data  
**Function:** Parses and reformats the incoming category data into a structured JSON format for later use (e.g., extracting name, slug, description).

## Get many customers
**Node Name:** Get many customers  
**Function:** Fetches all customer data from WooCommerce using the WooCommerce API.

## Limit
**Node Name:** Limit  
**Function:** Limits the number of customers processed to 10 (likely for performance or testing purposes).

## & Loop Over Items
**Node Name:** Loop Over Items  
**Function:** Iterates over the customer list in batches (controlled loop) for further processing.

## Clean Number
**Node Name:** Clean Number  
**Function:** Cleans up customer phone numbers by removing non-digit characters and prepares name, email, and address from billing info.

## & Check valid WhatsApp number Using Rapiwa
**Node Name:** Check valid WhatsApp number Using Rapiwa  
**Function:** Sends a POST request to the Rapiwa API to check if the cleaned number is a valid WhatsApp number.

## & If
**Node Name:** If  
**Function:** Evaluates the `exists` field in the API response to determine if the number is a valid WhatsApp number (true) or not (false).

## Send Message Using Rapiwa
**Node Name:** Send Message Using Rapiwa  
**Function:** If the number is valid, sends a WhatsApp message to the user with the new category info using the Rapiwa API.

## & verified append row in sheet
**Node Name:** verified append row in sheet  
**Function:** Appends the verified user's data (with status "verified") to a specific Google Sheet.

## & unverified append row in sheet
**Node Name:** unverified append row in sheet  
**Function:** Appends the unverified user's data (with status "unverified") to the same Google Sheet.

## & Wait
**Node Name:** Wait  
**Function:** Introduces a pause before looping back to the next batch ‚Äî helps avoid API throttling or limits.

## Summary Flow:

1. Webhook receives category data  
2. Formats category data  
3. Fetches WooCommerce customers  
4. Cleans their info  
5. Verifies WhatsApp number  
6. Sends message if valid  
7. Logs each user to Google Sheets (verified/unverified)  
8. Waits and loops to the next customer

main.node: Check valid whatsapp number Using Rapiwa

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.
